EmailTemplate.name: OPS CONF Johannesburg.2015 OPS CONF Johannesburg Registration Received Email
EmailTemplate.subject: Honeywell Regional OPS Conference
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Customer}}
Your registration for the Regional OPS Conference in Johannesburg, South Africa has been received.
If you are able to attend, I look forward to welcoming you to the event on July 7th. If you require any further information about the event, the agenda or venue, please do not hesitate to contact me directly.
If you are unable to attend but would like further information on our range of products and services, please do not hesitate to contact me, and I would be delighted to arrange a separate meeting.
Jaroslav Hajecek Customer Support Manager
Honeywell Aerospace
